code: import{gameRefreshed,roundEnded}from"www/store/game/actions";import{getGame}from"www/store/game/selectors";import{useAppSelector}from"www/store/hooks";import{ButtonDispatch}from"www/widgets/ButtonDispatchWidget";import{LinkDispatch}from"www/widgets/LinkDispatchWidget";import{screenPopped}from"www/widgets/ScreenStackWidget/actions";import{getCurrentScreenName}from"www/widgets/ScreenStackWidget/selectors";import{Bar}from"www/theme/Bar";import{Spacer}from"www/theme/Spacer";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function GameHeader(){var isGameScreen=useAppSelector(getCurrentScreenName)==="game";var game=useAppSelector(getGame);var gameName=game.gameName,creatorName=game.creatorName,roundNumber=game.roundNumber,playerNameTurn=game.playerNameTurn;console.log("ronda: "+roundNumber+" ,torn: "+playerNameTurn);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Bar,{color:"lightgray",children:[!isGameScreen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkDispatch,{createAction:screenPopped,children:"\xAB Back"}),"\xA0|\xA0"]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{"data-testid":"game-header",children:["Game ",gameName," created by ",creatorName,", round ",roundNumber,", Turn of ",playerNameTurn]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spacer,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ButtonDispatch,{createAction:roundEnded,children:"End Round"}),"\xA0",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ButtonDispatch,{createAction:gameRefreshed,children:"Refresh"})]});}
